mapper.select: select p.id as postId, c.community_name as communityName, c.follower_count as followerCount, p.title as title, p.content as content, p.like_count as likeCount, p.poster_id as posterId, p.create_time as createTime from posts as p left join community as c on p.community_id = c.id where 1 = 1 order by p.create_time limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT posts.`id` AS postId,users.`id` AS userId,users.`username` AS userName, posts.`create_time` AS createTime,users.`location`,community.`id` AS communityId, community.`community_name` AS communityName,community.`follower_count` AS followerCount, posts.`title`,posts.`content`,posts.`post_type` AS postType, CONCAT( '[', GROUP_CONCAT( JSON_OBJECT( 'commentId',comment.`id`,'commentType',comment.`comment_type`, 'commentUserId',comment.`user_id`, 'commentContent',comment.`content`, 'commentCreateTime',comment.`create_time` ) SEPARATOR ',' ), ']' ) AS `comment`
FROM posts,users,`comment`,community WHERE posts.`id`=#{postId} AND posts.`poster_id`=users.`id` AND community.`id`=posts.`community_id` AND comment.`post_id`=posts.`id` GROUP BY posts.`id`
